item.name: The National Child Traumatic Stress Network
item.description: This organisation promotes improvement of treatment and services for children and their families who have encountered trauma.

item.name: International Society for Traumatic Stress Studies
item.description: This organisation works to spread information and research out about trauma and many associated aspects of it, such as treatment, knowledge, and guidelines.

item.name: Complex Trauma Treament Network
item.description: This organisation is a part of The National Child Traumatic Stress Network and focuses on training for treating children with complex trauma, which overlaps with developmental trauma.
